item.title: Learn Runescript?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:15, topic:350972”][quote author=jme link=topic=447330.msg3293370#msg3293370 date=1280780887]

Nobody gave a realistic answer.

Yes, it is possible for you to learn RuneScript, but the odds of it are very low. You would need to manage to get Jagex to share the compiler and some tutorials …

You would only need the java compiler. You would need their game engine to use runescript. Which we won’t ever have of course.
[/quote]what? the script interpreter is accessible to anyone with access to a runescape client, although it wouldn’t actually help you learn the syntax since it’s already in its emitted form

it’s like asking to learn java with only a class file and a jvm at hand, assuming you reverse engineer the vm, you’d be able to understand bytecode (its emitted form), but not its pre-compiled syntax[/quote]

Well I was mostly pointing out that jagex wouldn’t have to “share their compiler.” Guess I was wrong about the last part

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Runescript?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:

[quote=“jme, post:14, topic:350972”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=447330.msg3293104#msg3293104 date=1280768476]
Nobody gave a realistic answer.

Yes, it is possible for you to learn RuneScript, but the odds of it are very low. You would need to manage to get Jagex to share the compiler and some tutorials …
[/quote]

You would only need the java compiler. You would need their game engine to use runescript. Which we won’t ever have of course.[/quote]what? the script interpreter is accessible to anyone with access to a runescape client, although it wouldn’t actually help you learn the syntax since it’s already in its emitted form

it’s like asking to learn java with only a class file and a jvm at hand, assuming you reverse engineer the vm, you’d be able to understand bytecode (its emitted form), but not its pre-compiled syntax

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Runescript?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:13, topic:350972”]Nobody gave a realistic answer.

Yes, it is possible for you to learn RuneScript, but the odds of it are very low. You would need to manage to get Jagex to share the compiler and some tutorials …[/quote]

You would only need the java compiler. You would need their game engine to use runescript. Which we won’t ever have of course.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Runescript?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Nobody gave a realistic answer.

Yes, it is possible for you to learn RuneScript, but the odds of it are very low. You would need to manage to get Jagex to share the compiler and some tutorials, or, get a job at Jagex. The odds of either of these happening for you, are slim to none. So in the short answer, most likely, you will never even get the chance to learn it.

Read full topic
